rfpDetails.title: Automated Production Line System
rfpDetails.description: RFP for a fully automated production line, including robotics, assembly, and quality control systems.

evaluationCriteria.name: Technical Capability
evaluationCriteria.description: Ability to meet specified technical requirements and system integration.

evaluationCriteria.name: Pricing Structure
evaluationCriteria.description: Competitiveness of proposed costs, including hardware, software, installation, and maintenance.

evaluationCriteria.name: Delivery & Implementation Timeline
evaluationCriteria.description: Feasibility and speed of project completion.

evaluationCriteria.name: Supplier Past Performance
evaluationCriteria.description: Track record with similar projects and client references.

rfpResponses.responseContent: Response content for Automation Solutions Inc. This would be the full text or structured data from their RFP submission covering technical proposals, pricing tables, project timelines, and references.
Response content for Robotics Innovations Co. Similar to the above, this would be their comprehensive submission.
